mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DALOG_ID, t1.DALOG_NAME, t1.LOGINFO, t1.LOGSN, t1.LOGTYPE, t1.OBJECTID, t1.OBJECTTYPE, t1.REMOTEADDR, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDALOG t1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`DALOG_ID`, t1.`DALOG_NAME`, t1.`LOGINFO`, t1.`LOGSN`, t1.`LOGTYPE`, t1.`OBJECTID`, t1.`OBJECTTYPE`, t1.`REMOTEADDR`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_SRFDALOG` t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.DALOG_ID, t1.DALOG_NAME, t1.LOGINFO, t1.LOGSN, t1.LOGTYPE, t1.OBJECTID, t1.OBJECTTYPE, t1.REMOTEADDR, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_DALOG t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.DALOG_ID AS DALOG_ID, t1.DALOG_NAME AS DALOG_NAME, t1.LOGINFO AS LOGINFO, t1.LOGSN AS LOGSN, t1.LOGTYPE AS LOGTYPE, t1.OBJECTID AS OBJECTID, t1.OBJECTTYPE AS OBJECTTYPE, t1.REMOTEADDR AS REMOTEADDR, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDALOG t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.DALOG_ID AS DALOG_ID, t1.DALOG_NAME AS DALOG_NAME, t1.LOGINFO AS LOGINFO, t1.LOGSN AS LOGSN, t1.LOGTYPE AS LOGTYPE, t1.OBJECTID AS OBJECTID, t1.OBJECTTYPE AS OBJECTTYPE, t1.REMOTEADDR AS REMOTEADDR, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFDALOG t1

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[DALOG_ID], t1.[DALOG_NAME], t1.[LOGINFO], t1.[LOGSN], t1.[LOGTYPE], t1.[OBJECTID], t1.[OBJECTTYPE], t1.[REMOTEADDR], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN] FROM [T_SRFDALOG] t1
